text: (nabiyē! ovunṭa dharmaya pahaḷa kaḷa) ē andamaṭama api obaṭa (mema) dharmaya pahaḷa kara ættemu. ebævin api kavurun haṭa (pera) dharmaya labā dī ættemuda, ovun(gen vū satyavantayin) meyada (mema dharmayada anivāryayen) viśvāsa karannāha. tavada (arābivarun vana) movungen (sādhāraṇa buddhiyen yutu) samaharunda meya viśvāsa karannāha. (sitaṭa noekan̆gava pratikṣēpa karana) kāfirvarun hæra, (an kisivekut) apagē āyāvan pratikṣēpa nokarannāha
